0.Summary: "Fast paced work environment and a great starter job"
0.Pros: Good work experience and pay is good. It helps if there are friendly people working with you. Great started job to someone in high school.
0.Cons: Working in fast food isn't the best thing in the world, so it obviously has its cons. I would say the biggest con is the customers who are rude.
